snippet: Investors seeking higher yields are increasingly turning to riskier sectors like real estate and hedge funds, BlackRock found in a survey of 100 institutions released on Thursday.
abstract: Investors seeking higher yields are increasingly turning to riskier sectors like real estate and hedge funds, BlackRock found in a survey of 100 institutions released on Thursday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Investors Turning to Riskier Investments for Returns, BlackRock Survey Finds
